articles.author: Zach Mentz, cleveland.com
articles.title: Social Security COLA 2025 benefits increase: Here’s how much you’ll get - cleveland.com
articles.description: The cost-of-living adjustment (COLA) for Social Security benefits and Supplemental Security Income payments will increase 2.5% in 2025 for more than 72 million Americans, the Social Security Administration announced Thursday.
articles.content: Social Security benefits and Supplemental Security Income payments will increase 2.5% for more than 72 million Americans in 2025 as part of the annual cost-of-living adjustment (COLA), the Social Sec… [+1845 chars]
